content:
## Timeblocks

### v1

```plain text
7:30 | Wake Up
7:30 - 8:00 | (late) morning routine
8:00 - 10:00 | Fix loading screen on blog; also incorporate task list snapshots on timeblocks page
10:00 - 11:00  | Look into implementing sleep diary
11:00 - 15:00 | Experiment with VSCode Live Share for Dialect
15:00 - 19:00 | Compile AdminControl (add vue-lion) and set it up on my MacBook
19:00 - 21:00 | Look into Y Combinator Startup School; create completion timeline
21:00 - 22:00 | Write down concrete plans for getting more exercise, eating healthier & schedule a time for solitude walking every day
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v2

Woke up late

```plain text
10:15 | Wake Up
10:15 - 10:30 | Call with Kevin X
10:30 - 12:00 | Fix loading screen on blog; also incorporate task list snapshots on timeblocks page
12:00 - 15:00 | Experiment with VSCode Live Share for Dialect
15:00 - 19:00 | Compile AdminControl (add vue-lion) and set it up on my MacBook
19:00 - 21:00 | Look into Y Combinator Startup School; create completion timeline
21:00 - 22:00 | Write down concrete plans for getting more exercise, eating healthier & schedule a time for solitude walking every day
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### Notes

Note to self: Make polishing up the ReactiveEmails Electron app a priority (since it will be necessary before I can comfortably migrate all emails over to Reactive Emails)

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Brush Teeth, Make Bed, Place Kindle on Pillow
7:15 - 7:30 | Breakfast
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Bedtime; experiment with playing Weightless
```
